description:
Enjoy the body-hugging warmth only a down-filled mummy bag can deliver. During the day you'll appreciate the size and weight in your pack. Baffle construction and a full-length down draft tube eliminate cold spots. The efficient performance shape and 650-fill certified down hits the sweet spot on the warmth to weight ratio.

  • Durable ripstop shell and lining are lightweight and highly compressible
  • Gore-Tex Infinium™ Winstopper™ breathable laminate provides exceptional wind- and water-resistance
  • 650 fill down is supplied by Allied traceable down and sourced under the Responsible Down Standard (80% down, 20% feather)
  • Down filled collar gives that blanket-like feeling and keeps the warm right where it should be
  • Horizontal baffles wrap you in down and prevent the insulation from shifting and creating cold spots
  • Draft flap behind the anti-snag YKK® zipper ensures cold air doesn't sneak in
  • Hood lets you lift and move your head, even when fully zipped up and has a one-handed cinch adjustment
  • Contoured footbox provides maximum warmth and allows a natural foot position
  • Sturdy #5 zipper pull glows in the dark and gives a smooth zip every time
  • Performance Plus Mummy cut maximizes warmth to weight ratio
  • Includes a compression sack and home storage bag
name: Mountain Hardwear Bishop Pass Gore-Tex Infinium -18C Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
